mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, NICK_NM, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH, ROLE, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, ADDRESS, USE_YN, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY ROLE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER (USER_ID, USER_NM, NICK_NM, PASSWORD, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH, ROLE, ADDRESS, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{userNm}, #{nickNm}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, 'USER', #{address}, NOW(), NOW())
